text:
It's important for those getting the #CovidVaccine to show it's safe. 

Good to see @VP, @SecondLady, & @Surgeon_General showing us.

I hope @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris show the nation their trust in the science soon when they get their #vaccine 

#ThisIsOurShot
